title: Create a DocValuesFormat for sparse doc values
description:
We could have a special DocValuesFormat in lucene/codecs to better handle sparse doc values.

See http://search-lucene.com/m/HUeYW1RlEtc

comments.content:
a good baseline could be something as simple as passing COMPACT to the default DVConsumer?

or we could provide something that works entirely different... there are a lot of possibilities.
comments.author: Robert Muir

comments.content: This functionnality has been folded into the default codec via LUCENE-6863
comments.author: Adrien Grand
